description: Opening doors to new city adventures, the water-repellent The North Face Nuptse Short women's insulated jacket offers a relaxed fit with a cropped, boxy silhouette.
name: Nuptse Short Insulated Jacket - Women's

specs.value: Body/overlay: 20-denier 38 g/m recycled ripstop nylon with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish
20-denier 78 g/m recycled nylon matte ripstop with non-PFC DWR finish
700-fill-power goose down; Responsible Down Standard (RDS) certified by Control Union, CU 843098
